entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
